title: yii\console\widgets\Table w/o screen
body:
### What steps will reproduce the problem?

```
echo Table::widget([
    'headers'       => ['h1', 'h2', 'h3'],
    'rows'          => [[1,2,3], [1,2,3], [1,2,3]],
]);
```
run script with `yii\console\widgets\Table` via `cron` with `stdout` to `*.log` file like:

```
php /path/to/index.php command > /path/to.log 2>&1
```

also same problem i see, when just run command like `php /path/to/index.php command` in PhpStorm `Command Line Tools Console` (Tools -> Run Command...)

### What is the expected result?
```
╔════╤════╤════╗
║ h1 │ h2 │ h3 ║
╟────┼────┼────╢
║ 1  │ 2  │ 3  ║
╟────┼────┼────╢
║ 1  │ 2  │ 3  ║
╟────┼────┼────╢
║ 1  │ 2  │ 3  ║
╚════╧════╧════╝
```
